attributes.action: supply all OAPs with suitable bedding
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
OAPs are finding it increasingly difficult to pay for the ever-increasing council tax bills and utility bills (I've actually spoken to pensioners about this and it's a sad situation).

The government should help the aged by providing each one with a suitable, thermally-insulated duvet (or equivelant) to keep them warm through the winter.   

In addition they should be issued with a small winter hamper containing cup-a-soups etc (ie. foodstuffs aimed at keeping them warm).

And they should be given a hat for the summer (to keep the sun off).

We should take more responsibility for the old of our country.
